item.title: Wealth Management
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Wealth Management

  • Home
Our Services
  • Financial Planning
  • Wealth Management
  • Portfolio Consulting
  • Mergers & Acquisitions
  • Sustainability Assurance
  • Crisis Management

We value ideas, talent, and voices of our people!

We get to know the people who make the company work believe investing this way powers funds with a diverse of experienced Join Our Community Allianz@7oroof.com Download Brochure Our Report 2023 Company Brochure Overview We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. We also offer expert guidance, unlocking your potential for growth and profitability that helps proof our business investment and ensuring success in our mission as business advisors! Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier business growth. Financial success depends on relying on a team of experts with in-depth knowledge and massive experience in business application solutions to guide you through the process and provides the necessary tools to reach the desired goal and exceed your expectations.

Find out about the ways to deal with debts if you are falling behind with daily bills, loan and repayments or other commitments. Get some free advice by speaking to one of our financial advisers over the phone! Just submit your details and we’ll be in touch shortly. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Key Benifits We believe that financial goals are more than a number to our clients. It may represent a new home, a small business, a comfortable retirement or a college education. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. What type of clients do you work with? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Is there a fee for an initial meeting with you? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Will you work with my accountant and lawyer? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Do you have any tools that help track my finances? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Stats & Charts Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier business growth.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Retail & Consumer Sciences & Healthcare Industrial & Chemical Power Generation Oil & Gas Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Our purpose is to build trust and maintaining a long lasting relationships with our clients.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Year over year, we get to know the people who make the company work. We believe investing this way not only can ease risk, it powers each fund with a diverse of experienced investment professionals. 01 Acknowledge needs and objectives We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met. Then we review your portfolios to see if they’re well positioned to meet 02 Provide a comprehensive long term perspective We ascertain our client’s financial outlook to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital, a balance of income and appreciation, or growth. 03 Establish confidence and discuss opportunities We will provide unique recommendationa in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement income needs. What Our Customers Feel About Our Services!

When our customers succeed, so do we!!

It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align project team with our culture and needs. It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align project team with our culture and needs. Dana Wade Sr Optime Inc Ann John Optime Inc Interested in cooperation or have questions?

item.title: Financial Planning
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Financial Planning

  • Home
Our Services
  • Financial Planning
  • Wealth Management
  • Portfolio Consulting
  • Mergers & Acquisitions
  • Sustainability Assurance
  • Crisis Management

We value ideas, talent, and voices of our people!

We get to know the people who make the company work believe investing this way powers funds with a diverse of experienced Join Our Community Allianz@7oroof.com Download Brochure Our Report 2023 Company Brochure Overview We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. We also offer expert guidance, unlocking your potential for growth and profitability that helps proof our business investment and ensuring success in our mission as business advisors! Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier business growth. Financial success depends on relying on a team of experts with in-depth knowledge and massive experience in business application solutions to guide you through the process and provides the necessary tools to reach the desired goal and exceed your expectations.

Find out about the ways to deal with debts if you are falling behind with daily bills, loan and repayments or other commitments. Get some free advice by speaking to one of our financial advisers over the phone! Just submit your details and we’ll be in touch shortly. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Key Benifits We believe that financial goals are more than a number to our clients. It may represent a new home, a small business, a comfortable retirement or a college education. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. What type of clients do you work with? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Is there a fee for an initial meeting with you? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Will you work with my accountant and lawyer? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Do you have any tools that help track my finances? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Stats & Charts Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier business growth.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Retail & Consumer Sciences & Healthcare Industrial & Chemical Power Generation Oil & Gas Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Our purpose is to build trust and maintaining a long lasting relationships with our clients.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Year over year, we get to know the people who make the company work. We believe investing this way not only can ease risk, it powers each fund with a diverse of experienced investment professionals. 01 Acknowledge needs and objectives We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met. Then we review your portfolios to see if they’re well positioned to meet 02 Provide a comprehensive long term perspective We ascertain our client’s financial outlook to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital, a balance of income and appreciation, or growth. 03 Establish confidence and discuss opportunities We will provide unique recommendationa in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement income needs. What Our Customers Feel About Our Services!

When our customers succeed, so do we!!

It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align project team with our culture and needs. It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align project team with our culture and needs. Dana Wade Sr Optime Inc Ann John Optime Inc Interested in cooperation or have questions?
item.excerpt:encoded: Financial planning is the process of taking a comprehensive look at your financial situation and building a specific financial plan to reach your goals.

item.content:encoded:
Financial Planning

  • Home Main
Our Services

We value ideas, talent, and voices of our people!

We get to know the people who make the company work believe investing this way powers funds with a diverse of experienced Join Our Community Allianz@7oroof.com Download Brochure Our Report 2023 Company Brochure Overview We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. We also offer expert guidance, unlocking your potential for growth and profitability that helps proof our business investment and ensuring success in our mission as business advisors! Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier business growth. Financial success depends on relying on a team of experts with in-depth knowledge and massive experience in business application solutions to guide you through the process and provides the necessary tools to reach the desired goal and exceed your expectations.

Find out about the ways to deal with debts if you are falling behind with daily bills, loan and repayments or other commitments. Get some free advice by speaking to one of our financial advisers over the phone! Just submit your details and we’ll be in touch shortly. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Key Benifits We believe that financial goals are more than a number to our clients. It may represent a new home, a small business, a comfortable retirement or a college education. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. What type of clients do you work with? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. Is there a fee for an initial meeting with you? Retail & Consumer Sciences & Healthcare Industrial & Chemical Power Generation Oil & Gas Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Our purpose is to build trust and maintaining a long lasting relationships with our clients.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Year over year, we get to know the people who make the company work. We believe investing this way not only can ease risk, it powers each fund with a diverse of experienced investment professionals. 01 Acknowledge needs and objectives We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met. Then we review your portfolios to see if they’re well positioned to meet 02 Provide a comprehensive long term perspective We ascertain our client’s financial outlook to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital, a balance of income and appreciation, or growth. 03 Establish confidence and discuss opportunities We will provide unique recommendationa in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement income needs. What Our Customers Feel About Our Services!

When our customers succeed, so do we!!

It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align project team with our culture and needs. It’s been an excellent experience. We value ideas, talent, and voices of our people!

We get to know the people who make the company work believe investing this way powers funds with a diverse of experienced Join Our Community Allianz@7oroof.com Download Brochure Our Report 2023 Company Brochure We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. We also offer expert guidance, unlocking your potential for growth and profitability that helps proof our business investment and ensuring success in our mission as business advisors! Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier business growth. Financial success depends on relying on a team of experts with in-depth knowledge and massive experience in business application solutions to guide you through the process and provides the necessary tools to reach the desired goal and exceed your expectations.

Find out about the ways to deal with debts if you are falling behind with daily bills, loan and repayments or other commitments. Get some free advice by speaking to one of our financial advisers over the phone! Just submit your details and we’ll be in touch shortly. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Case Studies Business|Mobile|Tech

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Take control of your financial future and start growing your wealth

Grow Your Wealth With Our Leading Edge Solutions!

Grow Your Wealth We help our clients achieve their goals by providing expert consulting services. Take control of your financial future and start growing your wealth

A Global Strategy Designed To Solve Time Challenges!

A Global Strategy We help our clients achieve their goals by providing expert consulting services. Putting the right solutions and methods in place.

A global consulting firm experienced in identifying, assessing, and solving all business challenges!​

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. We also offer expert guidance, unlocking your potential for growth and profitability that helps proof our business investment and ensuring success in our mission as business advisors! Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier Watchvideo Consulting services tailored for your financial needs! Financial success depends on relying on a team of experts with in-depth knowledge and massive experience in business application solutions to guide you through the process and provides the necessary tools to reach the desired goal and exceed your expectations.

Find out about the ways to deal with debts if you are falling behind with daily bills, loan and repayments or other commitments. Get some free advice by speaking to one of our financial advisers over the phone! Just submit your details and we’ll be in touch shortly. Impartial Consulting Services to Empower Your Growth! Get Started 1 Released projects and strategies planned by company in 2024. 0, 1 Qualified and dedicated team of financial experts to help you. 1 Satisfied and happy clients we have servedall over the world. 0, 1 Years of proven financial expertise in wealth management planning. Committed to clients, focused on results.

Consulting strategies that focus on what’s important to your beloved ones needs.

29

Financial Planning

Financial planning is the process of taking a comprehensive look at your financial situation and building a specific financial plan to reach your goals. As a result, financial planning often delves into multiple areas of finance, including taxes, savings, retirement, your estate, insurance and more. Tax PlanningOur financial planners help clients address certain tax issues and figure out how to maximize your tax refunds and minimize your tax liability. Retirement PlanningWe provide retirement planning services which will help you prepare for that day. Our consultants will make sure that you’ve saved enough money to live your lifestyle. Find Your Advisor Learn More 1 % Personalized business development reports that help reveal gaps & chances in your practice.

Wealth Management

Wealth management is an investment advisory practice focused on serving the unique needs of wealthy individuals. The practice incorporates wide range of services, including financial planning and investment management, to manage significant amounts of wealth in a comprehensive fashion. Risk ManagementYou can hire a financial advisor to help you manage your own wealth, especially if you don’t classify as a high net worth individual, no worries we will help you. Social Security BenefitsThe benefit is based on their spouse’s contributions to Social Security and is capped at 50% of their benefit amount at full retirement age. Find Your Advisor Learn More 1 % Multiple plan solutions make it easy to scale your practice and meet all our clients’ needs.

Portfolio Consulting

Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s why we offer separately managed accounts for a diverse range of investment objectives. Learn how they can help you deliver more for your clients. Find unique customizable solutions for your portfolio from a range of Portfolio SolutionsInvestments that seek to provide superior long term results, combined with an objective based approach, can be the foundation of your clients' portfolios. Model Portfolio ReturnsModel portfolios offer multiple approaches to help clients pursue their investment objectives while freeing you to spend more time cultivating those relationships. Find Your Advisor Learn More 1 % Maximum drawdown is a measure of downside risk over a given time period; it is the maximum loss. We believe in a distinctive way of managing money.

The best solution forfuture business!

To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.
Banking & Finance
We can help you respond innovatively to this rapidly evolving world as part of our multi disciplinary team. Our deep industry insight, technical expertise and technology solutions can become your platform for success in this market. Read More
Sciences & Healthcare
Sciences and Healthcare practice helps pharmaceutical, biotech and medical clients develop future focused business strategies and implement the time critical programmes and procedures essential to success within worldwide regulatory frameworks. Read More
Technology & Software
As artificial intelligence and the internet of things move from concept to reality, all business executives worry about change, but tech companies must be especially cognizant of the forces driving change and increased complexity. Read More
Education & Training
Education is an important key to economic competitiveness and social cohesion. It helps individuals & communities to reach their full potential. Governments therefore committed to raising educational skills and access to lifelong learning. Read More
Hospitality & Leisure
Hospitality, leisure and tourism are vast areas that will give you the grounding to work in a variety of sectors from managing local sports centre or hotel, to planning itineraries of cruise ships, will give you the edge in this Read More
Power & Utilities
We can help you make the right moves in an era of new energy sources, smart grids, and digital transformation. Adapting to climate change and a new energy mix will require power sector to think differently about every aspect of Read More

We focus on helping clients shape the future of their business, and execute strategies on the changing face of the customer.   Schedule A Visit Explore All Industries Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Our purpose is to build trust and maintaining a long lasting relationships with our clients.

Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions. Year over year, we get to know the people who make the company work. We believe investing this way not only can ease risk, it powers each fund with a diverse of experienced investment professionals. 01 Acknowledge needs and objectives We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met. Then we review your portfolios to see if they’re well positioned to meet 02 Provide a comprehensive long term perspective We ascertain our client’s financial outlook to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital, a balance of income and appreciation, or growth. 03 Establish confidence and discuss opportunities We will provide unique recommendationa in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement income needs. Innovate and learn
from failure Create impact with
our colleagues

Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier business growth with our great expert guidance.  Request A Free Consultation Resources that will guide your decision making.

New ways to engage
& empower clients

item.title: Home Modern
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Grow Your Wealth With Our Leading Edge Solutions!

Putting Right Solutions And Methods In Place

Specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with all our clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success! Committed to clients, focused on results.

Consulting strategies that focus on what’s important to your beloved ones needs.

No matter what area or challenge you’re tackling, we can help. Our firm identify the most relevant insights and apply integrated technologies with innovative ways to empower our people. Take control of your financial futureand grow your wealth now! Find Your Advisor
Financial Planning
Financial planning is the process of taking a comprehensive look at your financial situation and building a specific financial plan to reach your goals. Investment PlanningRetirement PlanningTax Planning
Wealth Management
Wealth management is an investment advisory practice focused on serving the needs of wealthy individuals, and practice incorporates wide range of services. Estate PlanningRisk ManagementSocial Security Benefits
Portfolio Consulting
Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s why we offer many managed accounts for a diverse range of investment objectives. Model Portfolio ReturnsPortfolio AnalyticsPortfolio Solutions
Mergers & Acquisitions
The term mergers and acquisitions (M&A) refers to the consolidation of companies or their business assets through financial transactions between companies. Acquisition of AssetsConsolidationsManagement Acquisitions
Sustainability Assurance
Sustainability issues are taking the centre stage now. Environmental & social related risks consistently rank amongst the top assessed risks for businesses. Energy SolutionsIntegrated ReportingSustainability Reporting
1 2 Next

No matter how big you are and in what industries or sectors you do business, we can help you work smarter, provide support and help you achieve your business golas. Speak to one of our advisers and get free advice!   Schedule A Visit Explore Our Services A global strategy designed to solve tomorrow’s challenges.

We Build Trust And Maintaining A Long Lasting Relations!

We deliver the highest quality outcomes.

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. Our team works across all the markets and capabilities to help you establish a strategy that addresses the realities of your business. Whether you want to improve the performance of work or mitigate the risks of mergers and acquisitions.

We get to know the people who make the company work and believe investing this way powers clients’ funds with a diverse of experienced professionals. Our specialist team understands the importance of a long lasting relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a Michael Brian The Founder 0, 1 Highly qualified consultants at service. 1 Completed cases in last 5 years. 0, 1 Countries certified to operate. 1 % Satisfaction of customers. More About Us Personalized reports that help reveal chances in your practice.

%

%

Integrate a diverse range of ideas

We believe investing powers each fund and aim to increase diversity of ideas and reduce volatility of

Explore More Deliver the highest quality outcomes

Our research is more than just numbers. Year over year, we get to know the people who make the company work.

Explore More Believe in powerof implication

We keeping close contact with our management and spending time on location, drive a deep operational

Explore More Integrate a diverse range of ideas

We believe investing powers each fund and aim to increase diversity of ideas and reduce volatility of

Explore More Looking beyond numbers to create a plan! Putting the right solutions and methods in place.

Take control of your own financial future and start growing your wealth and achieve your goals!

We believe that financial goals are more than a number to our clients. It may represent a new home, a small business, a comfortable retirement or a college education. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security.
Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

The best solution for your business!

The best solution for your business!

Banking & Finance
We can help you respond innovatively to this rapidly evolving world as part of our multi disciplinary team. Our deep industry insight, technical expertise and technology solutions can become your platform for success in this market. Explore More
Sciences & Healthcare
Sciences and Healthcare practice helps pharmaceutical, biotech and medical clients develop future focused business strategies and implement the time critical programmes and procedures essential to success within worldwide regulatory frameworks. Explore More
Technology & Software
As artificial intelligence and the internet of things move from concept to reality, all business executives worry about change, but tech companies must be especially cognizant of the forces driving change and increased complexity. Explore More
Education & Training
Education is an important key to economic competitiveness and social cohesion. It helps individuals & communities to reach their full potential. Governments therefore committed to raising educational skills and access to lifelong learning. Explore More
Hospitality & Leisure
Hospitality, leisure and tourism are vast areas that will give you the grounding to work in a variety of sectors from managing local sports centre or hotel, to planning itineraries of cruise ships, will give you the edge in this Explore More
Power & Utilities
We can help you make the right moves in an era of new energy sources, smart grids, and digital transformation. Adapting to climate change and a new energy mix will require power sector to think differently about every aspect of Explore More

We’re here to help with any questions you have!!

What type of clients do you work with? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Is there a fee for an initial meeting with you? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Will you work with my accountant and lawyer? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. 1 Released projects and strategies planned by company in 2024. 0, 1 Qualified and dedicated team of financial experts to help you. 1 Satisfied and happy clients we have servedall over the world. 0, 1 Years of proven financial expertise in wealth management planning.

We help our clients achieve their goals!!

Speak to one of our advisers over the phone or just submit your details and we’ll be in touch shortly!

Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Acknowledge needs

We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met to see if they’re well positioned.

Provide a perspective

We ascertain our client’s financial to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital.

Discuss opportunities

We will provide recommendations in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement.

Our commitment to quality, including the results of our internal, governance and the standards that expect all of our member firms to follow.  Our Leadership Team

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Global Consulting Firm Experienced In Financial Business!

Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver investment solutions for a long term success. Schedule A Visit About Us Committed to clients, focused on results.

Consulting strategies that focus on what’s important to your beloved ones needs.

Financial Planning
Financial planning is the process of taking a comprehensive look at your financial situation and building a specific financial plan to reach your goals. Investment PlanningRetirement PlanningTax Planning
Wealth Management
Wealth management is an investment advisory practice focused on serving the needs of wealthy individuals, and practice incorporates wide range of services. Estate PlanningRisk ManagementSocial Security Benefits
Portfolio Consulting
Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s why we offer many managed accounts for a diverse range of investment objectives. Model Portfolio ReturnsPortfolio AnalyticsPortfolio Solutions
Mergers & Acquisitions
The term mergers and acquisitions (M&A) refers to the consolidation of companies or their business assets through financial transactions between companies. Acquisition of AssetsConsolidationsManagement Acquisitions
Sustainability Assurance
Sustainability issues are taking the centre stage now. Environmental & social related risks consistently rank amongst the top assessed risks for businesses. Energy SolutionsIntegrated ReportingSustainability Reporting
Crisis Management
As the world becomes more complex and connected, the threat of crisis looms more difficult as a reason of economic turmoil, geopolitical and climate change. Business ResilienceCrisis Plan DevelopmentCrisis Training

No matter how big you are and in what industries or sectors you do business, we can help you work smarter, provide support and help you achieve your business golas. Speak to one of our advisers and get free advice!   Schedule A Visit A global strategy designed to solve tomorrow’s challenges.

We Build Trust And Maintaining A Long Lasting Relations!

We deliver the highest quality outcomes.

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. Our team works across all the markets and capabilities to help you establish a strategy that addresses the realities of your business. Whether you want to improve the performance of work or mitigate the risks of mergers and acquisitions.

We get to know the people who make the company work and believe investing this way powers clients’ funds with a diverse of experienced professionals. Our specialist team understands the importance of a long lasting relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a Michael Brian The Founder 0, 1 Highly qualified consultants at service. 1 Completed cases in last 5 years. 0, 1 Countries certified to operate. 1 % Satisfaction of customers. More About Us Personalized reports that help reveal chances in your practice.

%

%

Integrate a diverse range of ideas

We believe investing powers each fund and aim to increase diversity of ideas and reduce volatility of

Explore More Deliver the highest quality outcomes

Our research is more than just numbers. Year over year, we get to know the people who make the company work.

Explore More Believe in powerof implication

We keeping close contact with our management and spending time on location, drive a deep operational

Explore More Integrate a diverse range of ideas

We believe investing powers each fund and aim to increase diversity of ideas and reduce volatility of

Explore More Looking beyond numbers to create a plan! Putting the right solutions and methods in place.

Take control of your own financial future and start growing your wealth and achieve your goals!

We believe that financial goals are more than a number to our clients. It may represent a new home, a small business, a comfortable retirement or a college education. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security.
Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

The best solution for your business!

The best solution for your business!

Banking & Finance
We can help you respond innovatively to this rapidly evolving world as part of our multi disciplinary team. Our deep industry insight, technical expertise and technology solutions can become your platform for success in this market. Explore More
Sciences & Healthcare
Sciences and Healthcare practice helps pharmaceutical, biotech and medical clients develop future focused business strategies and implement the time critical programmes and procedures essential to success within worldwide regulatory frameworks. Explore More
Technology & Software
As artificial intelligence and the internet of things move from concept to reality, all business executives worry about change, but tech companies must be especially cognizant of the forces driving change and increased complexity. Explore More
Education & Training
Education is an important key to economic competitiveness and social cohesion. It helps individuals & communities to reach their full potential. Governments therefore committed to raising educational skills and access to lifelong learning. Explore More
Hospitality & Leisure
Hospitality, leisure and tourism are vast areas that will give you the grounding to work in a variety of sectors from managing local sports centre or hotel, to planning itineraries of cruise ships, will give you the edge in this Explore More
Power & Utilities
We can help you make the right moves in an era of new energy sources, smart grids, and digital transformation. Adapting to climate change and a new energy mix will require power sector to think differently about every aspect of Explore More

We’re here to help with any questions you have!!

What type of clients do you work with? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Is there a fee for an initial meeting with you? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Will you work with my accountant and lawyer? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. 1 Released projects and strategies planned by company in 2024. 0, 1 Qualified and dedicated team of financial experts to help you. 1 Satisfied and happy clients we have servedall over the world. 0, 1 Years of proven financial expertise in wealth management planning.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Privacy Policy

  • Home Main

Covid-19 Update

We are shipping orders as usual, with our warehouse team working Monday-Friday while adhering to social distancing regulations.

DHL have informed us that they are experiencing major delays with both domestic and international shipping as a result of the Covid-19 pandemic.

Please contact us via Email, Instagram or Facebook if you have any questions regarding the above.

Within Europe

All orders are charged a flat rate of EU€7.50

Orders placed before 9am will usually be dispatched on the same business day.

Please be mindful that during sale periods, there may be a slight delay in dispatches

Delivery takes up to 4 business days most orders are received within 2 business days.

Express Shipping Within Europe

We also offer an express shipping option for a fee of €10 per order via the DHL eParcel Express Post network.

Orders placed before 9am will usually be dispatched on the same business day.

Please be mindful that during sale periods, there may be a slight delay in dispatches

Express Post guarantees a next business day delivery for all metropolitan areas in Europe. For regional areas, delivery will take between 2-3 business days.

Your signature will be requested upon delivery.

All orders are shipped using DHL and can be traced using the online tracking service sent to you with your order confirmation.

Please note, where an order is placed during a promotional period, there may be a delay on the date of dispatch due to the high volume of orders received.

We ship to most international destinations at a flat rate of EU€20.

Orders placed before 9am will usually be dispatched on the same business day.

Delivery takes between 10 and 12 working days.

If you have any questions about shipping, please feel free to contact us.

Our shipping charges do not include any import taxes and duties that may arise when entering your country. Customers are responsible for payment of such charges and these can't be calculated prior to shipping.

Please Note

Unfortunately due to a number of fraudulent orders, Somedays reserves the right to request identification material from international orders, or where a credit card origin is not that of the destination country.

This may include a scan of your Drivers Licence, Passport and the Credit Card used for the transaction, we appreciate your co-operation.

item.title: Test
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
1. Just sticky each item

Financial Planning

Financial planning is the process of taking a comprehensive look at your financial situation and building a specific financial plan to reach your goals. As a result, financial planning often delves into multiple areas of finance, including taxes, savings, retirement, your estate, insurance and more. Tax PlanningOur financial planners help clients address certain tax issues and figure out how to maximize your tax refunds and minimize your tax liability. Retirement PlanningWe provide retirement planning services which will help you prepare for that day. Our consultants will make sure that you’ve saved enough money to live your lifestyle. Investment PlanningOur consultants will help you estimate your investment portfolio by mapping out how much you should be investing and in which types of investments. Find Your Advisor Learn More 1 % Personalized business development reports that help reveal gaps & chances in your practice.

Wealth Management

Wealth management is an investment advisory practice focused on serving the unique needs of wealthy individuals. The practice incorporates wide range of services, including financial planning and investment management, to manage significant amounts of wealth in a comprehensive fashion. Risk ManagementYou can hire a financial advisor to help you manage your own wealth, especially if you don’t classify as a high net worth individual, no worries we will help you. Social Security BenefitsThe benefit is based on their spouse’s contributions to Social Security and is capped at 50% of their benefit amount at full retirement age. Estate PlanningFor the average individual contemplating estate planning for the first time, it’s not always clear which assets should be covered in a plan and how their distribution. Find Your Advisor Learn More 1 % Multiple plan solutions make it easy to scale your practice and meet all our clients’ needs.

Portfolio Consulting

Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s why we offer separately managed accounts for a diverse range of investment objectives. Learn how they can help you deliver more for your clients. Find unique customizable solutions for your portfolio from a range of Portfolio SolutionsInvestments that seek to provide superior long term results, combined with an objective based approach, can be the foundation of your clients' portfolios. Model Portfolio ReturnsModel portfolios offer multiple approaches to help clients pursue their investment objectives while freeing you to spend more time cultivating those relationships. Portfolio AnalyticsOur analyses examine diversification opportunities, objective risks, manager evaluations and stress testing, all from a team of dedicated supported consultants. Find Your Advisor Learn More 1 % Maximum drawdown is a measure of downside risk over a given time period; it is the maximum loss.

Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Acknowledge needs We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met to see if they’re well positioned. Provide a perspective We ascertain our client’s financial to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital. Discuss opportunities We will provide recommendations in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement. item.title: Industries
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Industries

  • Home
Putting the right solutions and methods in place.

Take control of your own financial future and start growing your wealth and achieve your goals!

We believe that financial goals are more than a number to our clients. It may represent a new home, a small business, a comfortable retirement or a college education. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security.
Building wealth is a goal that many people aspire to, but it can often seem like an overwhelming task. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.

Banking & Finance
We can help you respond innovatively to this rapidly evolving world as part of our multi disciplinary team. Our deep industry insight, technical expertise and technology solutions can become your platform for success in this market. Explore More
Sciences & Healthcare
Sciences and Healthcare practice helps pharmaceutical, biotech and medical clients develop future focused business strategies and implement the time critical programmes and procedures essential to success within worldwide regulatory frameworks. Explore More
Technology & Software
As artificial intelligence and the internet of things move from concept to reality, all business executives worry about change, but tech companies must be especially cognizant of the forces driving change and increased complexity. Explore More
Education & Training
Education is an important key to economic competitiveness and social cohesion. It helps individuals & communities to reach their full potential. Governments therefore committed to raising educational skills and access to lifelong learning. Explore More
Hospitality & Leisure
Hospitality, leisure and tourism are vast areas that will give you the grounding to work in a variety of sectors from managing local sports centre or hotel, to planning itineraries of cruise ships, will give you the edge in this Explore More
Power & Utilities
We can help you make the right moves in an era of new energy sources, smart grids, and digital transformation. Adapting to climate change and a new energy mix will require power sector to think differently about every aspect of Explore More
1 2 Next

We focus on helping clients shape the future of their business, and execute strategies on the changing face of the customer.   Schedule A Visit Personalized reports that help reveal chances in your practice.

Explore More Looking beyond numbers to create a plan! A global strategy designed to solve tomorrow’s challenges.

We Build Trust And Maintaining A Long Lasting Relations!

We deliver the highest quality outcomes.

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. Our team works across all the markets and capabilities to help you establish a strategy that addresses the realities of your business. Whether you want to improve the performance of work or mitigate the risks of mergers and acquisitions.

We get to know the people who make the company work and believe investing this way powers clients’ funds with a diverse of experienced professionals. Our specialist team understands the importance of a long lasting relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a Michael Brian The Founder 0, 1 Highly qualified consultants at service. 1 Completed cases in last 5 years. 0, 1 Countries certified to operate. 1 % Satisfaction of customers. More About Us

item.title: Home Classic
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Putting the right solutions and methods in place.

Best Solutions For Future Business!

Find Your Advisor Putting the right solutions and methods in place.

Believe In Power
Of Implication!

Find Your Advisor Innovate and learn!

We believe investing this way not only can ease risk, it powers each fund with a diverse of experienced investment.

Create our impact

Financial success depends on relying on a team of experts with in depth knowledge and massive experience in business.

Invest in relationships

We keeping close contact with management and spending time on location, drive a deep operational understanding.

Expect and deliver highest outcomes.

We believe that financial goals are more than a number to our clients. It may represent a new home, a comfortable retirement or a college education. To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central. More About Us Michael Brian The Founder

Grow Your Wealth With Our Leading Edge Solutions!

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. We also offer expert guidance, unlocking your potential for growth and profitability that proof our business investment and ensuring success! Diversity of ideas for investors funds! Helping in make smart financial decisions. No hidden fees, and no obligation

We’re here to help with any questions you have!!

What type of clients do you work with? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Is there a fee for an initial meeting with you? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Will you work with my accountant and lawyer? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. 1 Released projects and strategies planned by company in 2024. 0, 1 Qualified and dedicated team of financial experts to help you. 1 Satisfied and happy clients we have servedall over the world. 0, 1 Years of proven financial expertise in wealth management planning. A global strategy designed to solve tomorrow’s challenges.

Strategies that focus on your beloved ones needs.

Financial Planning
Financial planning is the process of taking a comprehensive look at your financial situation and building a specific financial plan to reach your goals.
Wealth Management
Wealth management is an investment advisory practice focused on serving the needs of wealthy individuals, and practice incorporates wide range of services.
Portfolio Consulting
Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s why we offer many managed accounts for a diverse range of investment objectives.
Mergers & Acquisitions
The term mergers and acquisitions (M&A) refers to the consolidation of companies or their business assets through financial transactions between companies.
Sustainability Assurance
Sustainability issues are taking the centre stage now. Environmental & social related risks consistently rank amongst the top assessed risks for businesses.
Crisis Management
As the world becomes more complex and connected, the threat of crisis looms more difficult as a reason of economic turmoil, geopolitical and climate change.

No matter how big you are and in what industries or sectors you do business, we can help you work smarter, provide support and help you achieve your business golas. Speak to one of our advisers and get free advice!   Schedule A Visit Integrate a diverse range of ideas

We believe investing powers each fund and aim to increase diversity of ideas and reduce volatility of

Explore More Deliver the highest quality outcomes

Our research is more than just numbers. Year over year, we get to know the people who make the company work.

Explore More Believe in powerof implication

We keeping close contact with our management and spending time on location, drive a deep operational

Explore More Integrate a diverse range of ideas

We believe investing powers each fund and aim to increase diversity of ideas and reduce volatility of

Explore More Looking beyond numbers to create a plan! What Our Customers Feel About Our Services!

When our customers succeed, so do we!!

It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align project team with our culture and needs. It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align project team with our culture and needs. Dana Wade Sr Optime Inc Ann John Optime Inc Industries   29

The best solution for future business!

Banking & Finance Sciences & Healthcare Technology & Software Education & Training Hospitality & Leisure Power & Utilities Industrial Manufacturing

We focus on helping clients shape the future of their business, and execute strategies on the changing face of the customer.   Schedule A Visit

News & Articles

BusinessConsumers
Empowered consumers are prepared to make changes response to disruptions!
Global uncertainties and supply chain issues are also leading many consumers to look more to their home markets. Eight in ten respondents expressed a willingness to pay a higher average price for products produced locally or domestically. Dec 26, 2023 GrowthLeadership
Family business stands to gain from next generation’s focus on growth and sustainability.
Global uncertainties and supply chain issues are also leading many consumers to look more to their home markets. Eight in ten respondents expressed a willingness to pay a higher average price for products produced locally or domestically. Dec 26, 2023 ChallengesPerformance
Productivity risen with remote working, but worker trust may pose a larger challenge!
Global uncertainties and supply chain issues are also leading many consumers to look more to their home markets. Eight in ten respondents expressed a willingness to pay a higher average price for products produced locally or domestically. Dec 26, 2023 CorporateTech
Demand for tech capabilities competition among corporate, private equity and buyers.
Global uncertainties and supply chain issues are also leading many consumers to look more to their home markets. Eight in ten respondents expressed a willingness to pay a higher average price for products produced locally or domestically. Dec 26, 2023 DigitalFunds
Traditional hedge funds now invest in digital assets nearly double a year ago!
Global uncertainties and supply chain issues are also leading many consumers to look more to their home markets. Eight in ten respondents expressed a willingness to pay a higher average price for products produced locally or domestically. Dec 26, 2023 BusinessTech
Digital technology risks are a key concern for business men and risk managment leaders.

item.title: Home Business Consulting
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
We Build Trust And Maintaining A Long Lasting Relations!

Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver investment solutions for a long term success. Our Services About Us

Global Consulting Firm Experienced In Financial Business!

Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver investment solutions for a long term success. Our Services About Us Impartial Consulting Services to Empower Your Growth!

Experienced in identifying, assessing, and solving all business challenges!

29 years of experience in consulting Financial success depends on relying on a team of experts with in depth knowledge and massive experience in business application solutions to guide you through the process. Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success and empower thier business growth. Michael Brian The Founder A global strategy designed to solve tomorrow’s challenges.

Strategies that focus on
your beloved ones needs.

Explore Our Services
Financial Planning
Investment Planning, Retirement Planning, Tax Planning Financial planning is the process of taking a comprehensive look at your financial situation and building a specific financial plan to reach your goals.
Wealth Management
Estate Planning, Risk Management, Social Security Benefits Wealth management is an investment advisory practice focused on serving the needs of wealthy individuals, and practice incorporates wide range of services.
Portfolio Consulting
Model Portfolio Returns, Portfolio Analytics, Portfolio Solutions Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s why we offer many managed accounts for a diverse range of investment objectives.
Mergers & Acquisitions
Acquisition of Assets, Consolidations, Management Acquisitions The term mergers and acquisitions (M&A) refers to the consolidation of companies or their business assets through financial transactions between companies.
Sustainability Assurance
Energy Solutions, Integrated Reporting, Sustainability Reporting Sustainability issues are taking the centre stage now. Environmental & social related risks consistently rank amongst the top assessed risks for businesses.
Crisis Management
Business Resilience, Crisis Plan Development, Crisis Training As the world becomes more complex and connected, the threat of crisis looms more difficult as a reason of economic turmoil, geopolitical and climate change.

No matter how big you are and in what industries or sectors you do business, we can help you work smarter, provide support and help you achieve your business golas. Speak to one of our advisers and get free advice!   Schedule A Visit We believe in a distinctive way of managing money.

Putting right solutions and methods in place.

Integrate a diverse range of ideas Explore More Deliver the highest quality outcomes Explore More Believe in powerof implication Explore More

Grow Your Wealth With Our Leading Edge Solutions!

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. We also offer expert guidance, unlocking your potential for growth and profitability that proof our business investment and ensuring Diversity of ideas for investors funds! Helping in make smart financial decisions. No hidden fees, and no obligation Innovate and learn!

We believe investing this way not only can ease risk, it powers each fund with a diverse of experienced investment.

Create our impact

Financial success depends on relying on a team of experts with in depth knowledge and massive experience in business.

Invest in relationships

We keeping close contact with management and spending time on location, drive a deep operational understanding.

How does it work?

Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Acknowledge needs We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met to see if they’re well positioned. Provide a perspective We ascertain our client’s financial to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital. Discuss opportunities We will provide recommendations in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement. Acknowledge needs We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met to see if they’re well positioned. Provide a perspective We ascertain our client’s financial to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital. Discuss opportunities We will provide recommendations in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement.

Case Studies

item.title: Home Advisory
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
We Believe In A Distinctive Way
Of Managing!!

Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver investment solutions for a long term success. Our Services About Us

Expect & Deliver Highest Quality Outcomes.

Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver investment solutions for a long term success. Our Services About Us

We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security and our core beliefs central to investing success. Process Optimization Data Analytics Risk Management

We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security and our core beliefs central to investing success. Process Optimization Data Analytics Risk Management

Grow Your Wealth With Our Leading Edge Solutions!

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. We also offer expert guidance, unlocking your potential for growth and profitability that proof our business investment and ensuring More About Us Michael Brian The Founder 1 Released projects and strategies planned by company in 2024. 0, 1 Qualified and dedicated team of financial experts to help you. 1 Satisfied and happy clients we have servedall over the world. 0, 1 Years of proven financial expertise in wealth management planning. Committed to clients, focused on results.

We are eperienced in identifying, assessing & solving all challenges!​

Financial Planning
Financial planning is the process of taking a comprehensive look at your financial situation and building a specific financial plan to reach your goals. Investment PlanningRetirement PlanningTax Planning
Wealth Management
Wealth management is an investment advisory practice focused on serving the needs of wealthy individuals, and practice incorporates wide range of services. Estate PlanningRisk ManagementSocial Security Benefits
Portfolio Consulting
Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s why we offer many managed accounts for a diverse range of investment objectives. Model Portfolio ReturnsPortfolio AnalyticsPortfolio Solutions
Mergers & Acquisitions
The term mergers and acquisitions (M&A) refers to the consolidation of companies or their business assets through financial transactions between companies. Acquisition of AssetsConsolidationsManagement Acquisitions
Sustainability Assurance
Sustainability issues are taking the centre stage now. Environmental & social related risks consistently rank amongst the top assessed risks for businesses. Energy SolutionsIntegrated ReportingSustainability Reporting
Crisis Management
As the world becomes more complex and connected, the threat of crisis looms more difficult as a reason of economic turmoil, geopolitical and climate change. Business ResilienceCrisis Plan DevelopmentCrisis Training

No matter how big you are and in what industries or sectors you do business, we
can help you work smarter, provide support and help you achieve your business golas. Speak to one of our advisers and get free advice!   Schedule A Visit Industries 29

The best solution for future business!

Banking & Finance Sciences & Healthcare Technology & Software Education & Training Hospitality & Leisure Power & Utilities Industrial Manufacturing

We focus on helping clients shape the future of their business, and execute strategies on the changing face of the customer.   Schedule A Visit How does it work?

Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Acknowledge needs

We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met to see if they’re well positioned.

Provide a perspective

We ascertain our client’s financial to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital.

Discuss opportunities

We will provide recommendations in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement.

Business|Mobile|Tech
How should business adapt to support our world?
Pricing|Tax
A catalyst to unlock potential in tax pricing and beyond
Strategies|Tech|Tips
Strategies for attracting and retaining prominent talents
Investment|Tech
Can the world reverse the fall in climate tech investment?
Business|Wealth
Why trustworthy data matters to your business and brand?
Investment|Tips
Building stakeholder trust for a sustainable performance
What Our Customers Feel About Our Services!

When our customers succeed, so do we!!

It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align their project team with our culture and needs. It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align their project team with our culture and needs. It’s been an excellent experience. Allianz team of consultants is a trusted partner; they took the necessary time to understand our operations and needs, which was essential for our providers and clients. They were professionals and made the right changes and adjustments to align their project team with our culture and needs. Dana Wade Sr Optime Inc Antoni Jr Allianz Inc Anna Palm Aline Inc

Looking beyond numbers to create a plan!

A strategy designed to solve tomorrow’s challenges.

We Build Trust And Maintaining A Long Lasting Relations!

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. Our team works across all the markets and capabilities to help you establish a strategy that addresses the realities of your business. Whether you want to improve the performance of work or mitigate the risks of mergers and acquisitions.

We get to know the people who make the company work and believe investing this way powers clients’ funds with a diverse of experienced professionals. Our specialist team understands the importance of a long lasting relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down path. What type of clients do you work with? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Is there a fee for an initial meeting with you? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Will you work with my accountant and lawyer? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Request A Free Consultation

Meet our
Visionaries

Our commitment to quality, including the results of our internal, audit governance and the standards that expect all of our member firms to follow and apply. Our Leadership Team

Mike Dooley

Chief Executive

Maria Andaloro

Portfolio Manager

Michael Brian

Vice Chair

Marian Chris

Managing Partner Interested in cooperation or have questions?

It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path.
Helping people make smart financial decisions is the most difficult mission. We are committed to publishing only accurate and actionable advice, personalized tools to help people navigate life’s big personal finance decisions.

item.content:encoded:

Looking beyond numbers to create a plan!

A strategy designed to solve tomorrow’s challenges.

We Build Trust And Maintaining A Long Lasting Relations!

We are a consulting firm with over 29 years of experience in all industries, supporting their financial growth. Our team works across all the markets and capabilities to help you establish a strategy that addresses the realities of your business. Whether you want to improve the performance of work or mitigate the risks of mergers and acquisitions.

We get to know the people who make the company work and believe investing this way powers clients’ funds with a diverse of experienced professionals. Our specialist team understands the importance of a long lasting relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. item.title: Request Consultation
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Request A Free Consultation

  • Home Main
We help our clients achieve their goals!!

Interested in cooperation or have questions? Just fill out the form and we will call you back.

Before we get started, we'd like to ask a few questions that will help us to better understand your business needs.

item.title: Pricing Plans
item.dc:creator: AllianzAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Pricing Plans

  • Home
We believe in a distinctive way of managing money.

Take control of your
own financial future & achieve your goals!

To help our clients go from dreaming to doing, we have our core beliefs that are central to their investing success. We’re here to help with any questions you have on your path to find financial security. It takes time, effort, and discipline to be successful with this goal, so don’t be lured by get rich quick schemes and too good to be true opportunities that can send you down a dangerous path. Starter Plan Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s we offer many managed accounts for diverse range of investment objectives. Diversity of ideas for investors funds! Helping in make smart financial decisions. No hidden fees, and no obligation $29.99 Professional Plan Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s we offer many managed accounts for diverse range of investment objectives. Diversity of ideas for investors funds! Helping in make smart financial decisions. No hidden fees, and no obligation $59.99 Business Plan Customization, control and tax efficiency are important to many investors. That’s we offer many managed accounts for diverse range of investment objectives. Diversity of ideas for investors funds! Helping in make smart financial decisions. No hidden fees, and no obligation $79.99 How does it work?

Expect and deliver the highest quality outcomes.

Acknowledge needs

We prepare for your meeting by identifying key milestones or events that have happened since we last met to see if they’re well positioned.

Provide a perspective

We ascertain our client’s financial to determine whether they should seek investments weighted toward preservation of capital.

Discuss opportunities

We will provide recommendations in sensible investment choices that will help our clients meet their long term goals or fund their retirement.

We’re here to help with any questions you have!!

What type of clients do you work with? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Is there a fee for an initial meeting with you? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. Will you work with my accountant and lawyer? Our specialist team of consultants understands the importance of maintaining a long lasting business relationships with clients to deliver specific investment solutions for a long term success. 1 Released projects and strategies planned by company in 2024. 0, 1 Qualified and dedicated team of financial experts to help you. 1 Satisfied and happy clients we have servedall over the world. 0, 1 Years of proven financial expertise in wealth management planning.
